product.composition: The composition tends to create a “blue effect” from blackberries, pear, blue wisteria, jasmine and coconut water.

story.inspiration: Light and airy, Daisy Dream captivates with its delectably fruity and floral personality.

comments: One of my favourite scents, I lived it since I smelled it for the first time. It's feminine and makes me feel so light. Love it, but it has a poor longitivity
She's beautiful. Feminine, fruity, floral... Ahhhh absolutely delicious, classy, its a scent so suitable as a signature scent, and it actually was my signature scent for a while!

product.composition: Top notes: grapefruit, green notes, raspberry and pear; middle notes: jasmine, rose, violet, litchi and apple blossom; base notes: musk, virginia cedar and plum.

story.inspiration: Like the woman who wears it, Daisy Eau So Fresh inspires boldness and femininity, sweetness and unpredictability.

comments: Very fresh as it name says. Easy to wear, suitable for everyday wear. A nice one for work as its very light. You wont be making any statements but you will smell clean, fresh and nice.

I tried today both daisy regular and this. What suprised me most, that eau so fresh had waaay better longevity than usual daisy! That lasted about 6 hrs on wrist. Very pretty fresh nice both casual and special occasion but need to spray a lot for evening.

product.accords: powdery, ozonic, aquatic, floral, white floral
product.composition: Top notes: wild berries; middle notes: violet flower; base notes: white woods.

story.inspiration: Inspired by a shimmering oasis where the sun dazzles and water glistens,  the fragrances transport Daisy girls to an endless summer sanctuary filled with endless blue skies, sparkling water and warm days.

comments: What a lovely summer scent! It’s cool, comforting, soft and beautiful. I wish it could have more longlivety. Love it.

Very similar to the original Daisy in my opinion, but with more emphasis on the violet note. If you love violet just like I do but want even more of it than in the original Daisy, this is right up your alley.

product.accords: green, woody, fruity, aromatic, almond, yellow floral
product.composition: Top notes: rhubarb and daffodil; middle note: almond milk; base notes: cashmeran and cedar.

story.inspiration: The perfume was inspired by Marc Jacobs’s mantra: 'I am perfect as I am,' which is symbolized by a tattoo of the word 'perfect' on his wrist. Like his tattoo, Perfect is about embracing and expressing one’s true self.

comments: Opens like a fresh, sweet daisy - youthful and green. Midnotes are like sugary water - a sheer sweetness then it dries down to a patchouli water with just a hint of sweetness. I really like it.

It's quite good. MJ took base from Daisy (or other flankers) and made it way less synthetic and more vibrant and fruity. It's a perfect summer perfume and is upgraded version of Escada's frags. Not cloying, great performance.
